Class BookController

  • java.lang.Object
    • cz.muni.fi.pa165.library.rest.controller.BookController

  • @RestController
 @RequestMapping(value="/books")
public class BookController
extends java.lang.Object
    REST controller for the Book entity.
    Author:
    Dávid Lupták

    • Method Detail

      • getBooks

        @RequestMapping(method=GET,
                produces="application/json")
public final java.util.List<BookDTO> getBooks(@RequestParam(value="isbn",required=false)
                                                                                                                       java.lang.String isbn)
        Get all books or one specified by ISBN.

        curl -i -X GET http://localhost:8080/pa165/rest/books curl -i -X GET http://localhost:8080/pa165/rest/books?isbn={value}

        Parameters:
        isbn - optional parameter for the query
        Returns:
        list of all books available in the system

      • getBook

        @RequestMapping(value="/{id}",
                method=GET,
                produces="application/json")
public final BookDTO getBook(@PathVariable(value="id")
                                                                                                                                     long id)
        Get the book with the respective id.

        curl -i -X GET http://localhost:8080/pa165/rest/books/{id}

        Parameters:
        id - identifier of the book
        Returns:
        DTO object of the book
        Throws:
        ResourceNotFoundException - if the book is not available in the system

      • deleteBook

        @RequestMapping(value="/{id}",
                method=DELETE,
                produces="application/json")
public final void deleteBook(@PathVariable(value="id")
                                                                                                                                        long id)
        Delete the book with the respective id.

        curl -i -X DELETE http://localhost:8080/pa165/rest/books/{id}

        Parameters:
        id - identifier of the book
        Throws:
        ResourceNotFoundException - if the book is not available in the system
        ResourceNotDeletableException - if the book cannot be deleted

      • createBook

        @RequestMapping(method=POST,
                consumes="application/json",
                produces="application/json")
public final BookDTO createBook(@RequestBody
                                                                                                                                                       BookNewDTO book)
        Create a new book by POST method.

        curl -X POST -i -H "Content-Type: application/json" --data '{"title":"Title","author":"Author","isbn":"978-0-321-35668-0"}' http://localhost:8080/pa165/rest/books

        Parameters:
        book - BookNewDTO with the required fields for creation
        Returns:
        the newly created book BookDTO
        Throws:
        ResourceAlreadyExistingException - if the book already exists

      • updateBook

        @RequestMapping(value="/{id}",
                method=PUT,
                consumes="application/json",
                produces="application/json")
public final BookDTO updateBook(@PathVariable(value="id")
                                                                                                                                                                                     long id,
                                                                                                                                                                                     @RequestBody
                                                                                                                                                                                     BookDTO book)
        Update the book by PUT method.

        curl -X PUT -i -H "Content-Type: application/json" --data '{"author":"New Author"}' http://localhost:8080/pa165/rest/books/{id}

        Parameters:
        id - identifier of the book
        book - BookDTO with the required fields to be updated
        Returns:
        the updated book BookDTO
        Throws:
        ResourceNotFoundException - if the book is not available in the system
        ResourceNotModifiedException - if the book cannot be modified
